This product is a set of 4 practice exams that help you simulate the experience of the certification exam, and they will help you in your preparation with 160 real exam-type questions.
With this set of 4 exams with 160 questions and answers, you can prepare to take and pass the Managing Professional Transition (MPT) exam on your 1st attempt and with an excellent score.

If you are an ITILv3 Expert certified professional, or if you have at least 17 credits in ITILv3, these practice exams will help you to achieve your super fast transition to obtain the designation as ITIL 4 Managing Professional before July 01-2022 when this certification will be withdrawal
